comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: You can simply just go to any exchange and buy Matic and then transfer it to the wallet. Gas fees are transaction fees needed by altcoin network to propagate your transaction. It is just like bank transfer fees for traditional currency. Also it is not just any coin needed for gas fee but the parent coin for that network, like every token on bnb smart chain needs bnb, while that on Ethereum network needâ€™s Ethereum. My guess is this is done to increase the adoption or demand rate for the parent coin on that network
